Package it.polimi.softeng.connectionProtocol.server

Class LoginManagerV2

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.connectionProtocol.server.LoginManagerV2
public class LoginManagerV2 extends Object
Class that manages the logins from both rmi and socket users for a match
